Multiplies the function by a scaling constant λ > 1 to ensure a slope greater than 1 for positive inputs.

SINC - Enum constant in enum class jhealy.aicme4j.net.Activation
Cardinal Sine, similar to cosine function, n decreases relative to the distance from the origin.

softmax(double[]) - Static method in class jhealy.aicme4j.net.Aicme4jUtils
Returns the result of applying the softmax or normalized exponential function to a vector corresponding to the output layer of a neural network.
softmaxCopy(double[]) - Static method in class jhealy.aicme4j.net.Aicme4jUtils

SOFTPLUS - Enum constant in enum class jhealy.aicme4j.net.Activation
A smooth version of ReLU that transforms n into a value between from 0 to n
SOFTSIGN - Enum constant in enum class jhealy.aicme4j.net.Activation
An alternative to hyperbolic tangent that transforms n into a value between -1 and 1
SSE - Enum constant in enum class jhealy.aicme4j.net.Loss
The Sum of Squared Errors computes the sum of the squares of the residuals in the output layer of the network.
standardise(double[]) - Static method in class jhealy.aicme4j.net.Aicme4jUtils
Returns a vector with each element rescaled around a mean of 0 and a standard deviation of 1.

Rescales the elements of a dataset with each element rescaled around a mean of 0 and a standard deviation of 1.

Returns the standard deviation of the elements in a vector.
stdev(double[][], int) - Static method in class jhealy.aicme4j.net.Aicme4jUtils
Returns the standard deviation of the feature values of a dataset.
STEP - Enum constant in enum class jhealy.aicme4j.net.Activation
Transforms n into either 0 or 1.
SUM - Enum constant in enum class jhealy.aicme4j.net.LayerSize
Sum of Input and Output heuristic, h(n, m) = n + m
SWISH - Enum constant in enum class jhealy.aicme4j.net.Activation
An alternative to ReLU, Swish transforms n into a value between -0.5 and n
